title: import& output the contacts via SIM card-
answer:
1. import the SIM card’s contacts to phone   
 Contacts> Menu>import/output >choose” China Unicom”(if the SIM card is

China Unicom)>phone>choose the contacts to copy of the SIM card>press   
 “OK”icon   
 2. Output the SIMcard’s contacts to phone   
 Contacts> Menu>import/output >phone >choose” China Unicom”(if the SIM card is   
 China Unicom) >choose the contacts to copy of the phone>press “OK”icon

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140926091042208001.png)  ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140926091103363001.png)
